short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove Facebook sponsored content from your feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quell /kwel/ verb: "put an end to (a rebellion or other disorder), typically by the use of force."

Ever notice how AdBlock doesn't hide ads from your home feed? Actually, none of the major Chrome Extensions do. Facebook uses a bunch of crafty techniques that make it difficult for developers to target those ads.

Notice: Quell is in an alpha state. You may experience experimental features or bugs. Please feel free to reach out with any interesting quirks you've found using Quell.
